step.description: Edge case: Invalid IATA origin code to test validation logic.

result.result: {"error": "搜索航班时发生错误: 无效的出发地机场代码: 'ABC123'。必须是3个字母的大写IATA代码。"}

step.description: Edge case: Invalid date format to test validation logic.

result.result: {"error": "搜索航班时发生错误: 无效的出发日期: '2025/06/15'。必须是格式为YYYY-MM-DD的有效日期。"}

step.description: Edge case: Missing return date in round trip request to test error handling.

result.result: {"error": "搜索航班时发生错误: 往返航班必须提供返回日期。"}

step.description: Edge case: Invalid cabin class to test validation logic.

result.result: {"error": "搜索航班时发生错误: 无效的舱位等级: 'invalid_class'。有效值为: economy, premium_economy, business, first。"}

step.description: Edge case: Multi-city itinerary with less than two segments to test validation logic.

result.result: {"error": "搜索多城市行程时发生错误: 无效的行程列表。必须是至少包含两个行程段的列表。"}
